title: "Is AI Better Than Your Board? 60 Seconds Can Prove It."
excerpt: "A follow-up study with over 600 c-suite leaders revealed that only 29% of executives rated board performance as “good or excellent.” That’s disturbingly poor, as only 21% think boards “spend enough time fulfilling their responsibilities” and two-thirds indicated that their boards fail to “ask probing questions.”"
